query:
SELECT 
  st.id as ticket_id,
  st.userId as ticket_userId,
  st.name as ticket_name,
  tr.id as reply_id,
  tr.message as reply_message,
  tr.isAdmin,
  tr.isReadByUser,
  tr.createdAt as reply_time
FROM supportTickets st
LEFT JOIN ticketReplies tr ON st.id = tr.ticketId
ORDER BY st.id, tr.createdAt;
